item.description:
This ride is sponsored by the AMC Boston Chapter Bike Committee, for more rides, events and information see: http://amcboston.org/bicycle/calendar.php

20-24 mi. Map & cue sheets provided. Helmet and bike in good condition required. Riders should be able to fix a flat and complete the ride in about 1.5 hrs. Rain cancels. Dinner at local restaurant follows ride. Meet at 6:00 for 6:15 start at Lincoln Schools lot by tennis courts on Ballfield Rd off Lincoln Rd, Lincoln, MA 01773.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the bicyclers gathering by the tennis courts

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: AMC Thursday Bike Ride - Lincoln
